casebody.data:
PONTCHARTRAIN NATURAL GAS SYSTEM, K/D/S Promix, L.L.C., and Acadian Gas Pipeline System
v.
TEXAS BRINE COMPANY, LLC No. 2019-C-0080 Supreme Court of Louisiana. March 6, 2019 ON WRIT OF CERTIORARI TO THE COURT OF APPEAL, FIRST CIRCUIT, PARISH OF ASSUMPTION Writ denied. CRICHTON, J., would grant and assigns reasons. CRICHTON, J., would grant and assigns reasons: For the reasons similarly assigned in my dissent in Crosstex Energy Services, LP v. Texas Brine Company, LLC , 18-0144 (La. 3/23/18), 238 So.3d 962 , I would grant this writ application, as I find there are genuine issues of material fact relating to the duty to defend and whether there was liability during the coverage period.
